nodes.text: Kazianna Alvamma was a female Cathar pirate living during the Cold War. She became affiliated with the White Maw pirates on Hoth and was killed around 3642 BBY.

Kazianna Alvamma appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Hoth. She is not directly involved in any quests, however she can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means she was killed.
